# Hachimi

> Hachimi (哈基米) is a gamified mobile habit-tracking app where every habit spawns a unique virtual kitten. Built with Flutter and Firebase. Users build habits through focus sessions while raising cats that evolve based on consistency. All AI runs on-device. Free, no ads, open source. Available on Android.

Official website: hachimi.ai. Source code: github.com/sinnohzeng/hachimi-app.

## Core Features

- [Cat Parenting System](https://hachimi.ai/en#features): Adopt a kitten from 3 randomly generated candidates. 15 pelt patterns, 19 colors, 21 eye colors, 6 personalities. XP-driven 4-stage evolution
- [Focus Timer](https://hachimi.ai/en#features): Countdown and stopwatch modes with persistent Android foreground service. Earn XP and 10 coins per minute of focus
- [Progress Tracking](https://hachimi.ai/en#features): Weekly trend charts, 91-day activity heatmap, and paginated session history
- [On-Device AI](https://hachimi.ai/en#faq): AI cat chat and auto-generated diary powered by Qwen3-1.7B running locally via llama_cpp_dart. Zero cloud dependency
